attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
Dear Ms Saunders

We have rejected your petition for the following reason:
"Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative."

If you would like to re-submit your petition, you may do so, but please remove any offensive statements.

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
